properties.title: Naturzentrum Thurauen
properties.abstract:
Let yourself be enchanted by the fascinating world of this
vibrant wetland landscape! The Thurauen Nature Centre
is situated right in the heart of a riverside forest. An
excursion to the area guarantees a day of exciting
encounters with the world of flora and fauna.
properties.description:
The Thurauen Nature Centre is the perfect place for an
eventful excursion, or as the starting point for walks and
cycling tours. Everything you need for a relaxing day
in the outdoors can be found in the immediate vicinity of
the Thurauen Nature Centre, including inviting spots for
campfires, a playground for children, and swimming
areas in the River Rhine.

The Nature Centre is also an ideal place for observing
wildlife. The impressive migration of frogs and toads
heralds the arrival of spring, while in May you can listen
to concerts given by golden orioles and tree frogs, and
in the summer colourful butterflies flit through the
air. Woodpeckers, beavers and dragonflies are also
abundant. With a bit of patience and luck, you will catch a glimpse of your very own favourite animal.

An exciting programme is offered for family and club excursions. Join us on «Beaver Day» and become better acquainted with the life and habits of beavers. We offer you a unique combination of unforgettable encounters with nature and fine food.
properties.name: Naturzentrum Thurauen
